mobile.name: homba
mobile.description: Part kestrel, part bear, part wolf. Parts is parts, and makes an ugly whole.

mobile.name: swordsman
mobile.long_description: The greatest swordsman in the land is standing here with a sneer on his face.

mobile.name: mummy rabscuttle
mobile.long_description: The Mummy of Rabscuttle wanders here, hands aloft, walking towards you.

mobile.name: lizard giant
mobile.description: This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground habitat. He looks very powerful.

mobile.name: woundwort general demon
mobile.long_description: General Woundwort, the dark demon of Minos, awaits to maul you to shreds.
mobile.description: He looks vaguely like a rabbit, but sure doesn't act like one.

mobile.name: franz henchman
mobile.long_description: Franz, Minos' henchman, is here ready to pump you up.
mobile.description: Franz is no girlie man. He is very muscular and looks as if he could squeeze your head like a grapefruit.

mobile.name: hanz henchman
mobile.long_description: Hanz is here flexing his muscles and squeezing grapefruits.
mobile.description: Hanz is no girlie man. He is very muscular and looks as if he could lift a large dragon.

mobile.name: minos king minotaur
mobile.long_description: King Minos the Minotaur is ready and waiting to gore you to death.

mobile.name: turtle dragon
mobile.long_description: A large dragon turtle breaks the surface churning the water into huge waves.
mobile.description: The turtle's shell is the size of a small house and looks as hard as rock.

mobile.name: hag sea
mobile.long_description: You notice the face of an ugly hag in the sea weeds.
mobile.description: The sea hag is terribly fightful and has razor sharp teeth.

mobile.name: merman
mobile.long_description: There is a merman swimming here brandishing his trident at you!
mobile.description: The merman has a powerful tail fin instead of legs.

mobile.name: crab crusty
mobile.long_description: A crusty looking crab is crawling around here searching for food.
mobile.description: It looks like a crab... what more can be said?
